languages.text: "Безусловно, ваше право настаивать на местном урегулировании конфликта. По оценкам моего совета, через несколько лет... когда закончится переоснащение служб безопасности и на орбиту будет выведена станция слежения... мы сможем, невзирая на атаки, произвести достаточно, чтобы удовлетворить сборщиков податей". {n}Вистенца вздыхает.{/n} "Вас вряд ли устраивает такой ответ, я понимаю. Но с нашими ресурсами это самый вероятный вариант развития событий".

traits.locale_text: "Безусловно, ваше право настаивать на местном урегулировании конфликта. По оценкам моего совета, через несколько лет... когда закончится переоснащение служб безопасности и на орбиту будет выведена станция слежения... мы сможем, невзирая на атаки, произвести достаточно, чтобы удовлетворить сборщиков податей". {n}Вистенца вздыхает.{/n} "Вас вряд ли устраивает такой ответ, я понимаю. Но с нашими ресурсами это самый вероятный вариант развития событий".

languages.text: "Of course, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. According to my council's report, perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and a surveillance void station has been established on the orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy the tithe collectors." {n}Vistenza sighs.{/n} "No doubt this answer displeases you. I do understand. But with our resources, it is the most likely scenario."
languages.original_text: "Безусловно, ваше право настаивать на местном урегулировании конфликта. По оценкам моего совета, через несколько лет... когда закончится переоснащение служб безопасности и на орбиту будет выведена станция слежения... мы сможем, невзирая на атаки, произвести достаточно, чтобы удовлетворить сборщиков податей". {n}Вистенца вздыхает.{/n} "Вас вряд ли устраивает такой ответ, я понимаю. Но с нашими ресурсами это самый вероятный вариант развития событий".

traits.locale_text: "Is that so? Well, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. Perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and the tracking station has been withdrawn from orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy both the Imperium's tithe collectors and your economic interests." {n}Vistenza's lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "If, of course, you do not consider it an undue burden to offer us assistance and use the tools available to you to combat the rebels."

"Of course, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. According to my council's report, perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and the surveillance void station has been established on the orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy tithe collectors." {n}Vistenza sighs.{/n} "You probably don't like that answer, I understand. But with our resources, it's the most likely scenario."

"Is that so? Well, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. Perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and the tracking station has been withdrawn from orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy both the Imperium's tithe collectors and your economic interests." {n}Vistenza's lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "If, of course, you do not consider it an undue burden to offer us assistance and use the tools available to you to combat the rebels."

"Of course, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. According to my council's report, perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and the surveillance void station has been established on the orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy tithe collectors." {n}Vistenza sighs.{/n} "You probably don't like that answer, I understand. But with our resources, it's the most likely scenario."

"Of course, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. According to my council's report, perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and a surveillance void station has been established on the orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy the tithe collectors." {n}Vistenza sighs.{/n} "No doubt this answer displeases you. I do understand. But with our resources, it is the most likely scenario."

"Of course, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. According to my council's report, perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and a surveillance void station has been established on the orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy the tithe collectors." {n}Vistenza sighs.{/n} "No doubt this answer displeases you. I do understand. But with our resources, it is the most likely scenario."

languages.text: “当然，您有权坚持当地自行解决当地冲突。根据议会的报告，或许几年之后……等安全部门重新武装起来，在轨道上建立起监视用的虚空站之后……我们就可以顶着敌人的攻击，生产出足够的资源来缴纳什一税了。”{n}维丝坦萨叹了口气。{/n}“毫无疑问，这个答案并不能让您满意，我也完全理解。不过，以我们当下的资源而言，这就是最有可能的结果。”
languages.original_text: "Of course, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. According to my council's report, perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and a surveillance void station has been established on the orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy the tithe collectors." {n}Vistenza sighs.{/n} "No doubt this answer displeases you. I do understand. But with our resources, it is the most likely scenario."

traits.locale_text: “当然，您有权坚持当地自行解决当地冲突。根据议会的报告，或许几年之后……等安全部门重新武装起来，在轨道上建立起监视用的虚空站之后……我们就可以顶着敌人的攻击，生产出足够的资源来缴纳什一税了。”{n}维丝坦萨叹了口气。{/n}“毫无疑问，这个答案并不能让您满意，我也完全理解。不过，以我们当下的资源而言，这就是最有可能的结果。”

languages.text: «Naturalmente, tiene derecho a insistir en que el conflicto se resuelva de forma local. Según el informe de mis consejeros, tal vez dentro de unos años... cuando hayamos reabastecido a los servicios de seguridad y establecido una estación del vacío para la vigilancia... entonces tal vez podamos producir suficiente para los recolectores a pesar de los ataques». {n}Vistenza suspira.{/n} «Ya sé que esta respuesta no es satisfactoria, pero es la situación más probable dados nuestros recursos».
languages.original_text: "Of course, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. According to my council's report, perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and a surveillance void station has been established on the orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy the tithe collectors." {n}Vistenza sighs.{/n} "No doubt this answer displeases you. I do understand. But with our resources, it is the most likely scenario."

traits.locale_text: «Naturalmente, tiene derecho a insistir en que el conflicto se resuelva de forma local. Según el informe de mis consejeros, tal vez dentro de unos años... cuando hayamos reabastecido a los servicios de seguridad y establecido una estación del vacío para la vigilancia... entonces tal vez podamos producir suficiente para los recolectores a pesar de los ataques». {n}Vistenza suspira.{/n} «Ya sé que esta respuesta no es satisfactoria, pero es la situación más probable dados nuestros recursos».

languages.text: 「もちろんです、現地の争いは現地で解決せよというのはもっともです。評議会の報告では、おそらくあと2年…安全保障の再整備と監視用ヴォイドステーションの軌道配備をした後…攻撃を受けようと、徴税官を満足させられるだけの生産を上げるにはそのくらいの時間がかかります」{n}ヴィステンツァはため息をつく。{/n}「私の回答にきっと気を悪くされたことでしょう。存じております。ですが、私たちが持つリソースでは、これが実現可能性の高いシナリオなのです」
languages.original_text: "Of course, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. According to my council's report, perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and a surveillance void station has been established on the orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy the tithe collectors." {n}Vistenza sighs.{/n} "No doubt this answer displeases you. I do understand. But with our resources, it is the most likely scenario."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです、現地の争いは現地で解決せよというのはもっともです。評議会の報告では、おそらくあと2年…安全保障の再整備と監視用ヴォイドステーションの軌道配備をした後…攻撃を受けようと、徴税官を満足させられるだけの生産を上げるにはそのくらいの時間がかかります」{n}ヴィステンツァはため息をつく。{/n}「私の回答にきっと気を悪くされたことでしょう。存じております。ですが、私たちが持つリソースでは、これが実現可能性の高いシナリオなのです」

languages.text: "Natürlich seid Ihr berechtigt, darauf zu bestehen, dass der Konflikt lokal beigelegt wird. Laut des Berichts meines Rats können wir vielleicht in einigen Jahren ... wenn die Sicherheitskräfte wieder ausgerüstet wurden und eine Leerenstation zur Überwachung im Orbit eingerichtet wurde ... trotz der Angriffe genügend produzieren, um die Eintreiber des Zehnts zu befriedigen." {n}Vistenza seufzt.{/n} "Natürlich missfällt Euch diese Antwort. Ich verstehe das. Aber mit unseren Ressourcen ist es das wahrscheinlichste Szenario."
languages.original_text: "Of course, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. According to my council's report, perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and a surveillance void station has been established on the orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy the tithe collectors." {n}Vistenza sighs.{/n} "No doubt this answer displeases you. I do understand. But with our resources, it is the most likely scenario."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich seid Ihr berechtigt, darauf zu bestehen, dass der Konflikt lokal beigelegt wird. Laut des Berichts meines Rats können wir vielleicht in einigen Jahren ... wenn die Sicherheitskräfte wieder ausgerüstet wurden und eine Leerenstation zur Überwachung im Orbit eingerichtet wurde ... trotz der Angriffe genügend produzieren, um die Eintreiber des Zehnts zu befriedigen." {n}Vistenza seufzt.{/n} "Natürlich missfällt Euch diese Antwort. Ich verstehe das. Aber mit unseren Ressourcen ist es das wahrscheinlichste Szenario."

languages.text: « Vous êtes bien évidemment en droit d'insister pour que le conflit soit résolu localement. D'après le rapport de mon conseil, si nous voulons atteindre une production suffisante pour satisfaire les percepteurs malgré les attaques, nous devons d'abord rééquiper les services de sécurité et établir une station de surveillance en orbite... ce qui devrait nous prendre un ou deux ans. Je me doute que cette réponse vous déplaît, {n}continue Vistenza avec un soupir,{/n} et je le comprends parfaitement. Mais avec les ressources dont nous disposons, il s'agit du scénario le plus probable. »
languages.original_text: "Of course, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. According to my council's report, perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and a surveillance void station has been established on the orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy the tithe collectors." {n}Vistenza sighs.{/n} "No doubt this answer displeases you. I do understand. But with our resources, it is the most likely scenario."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes bien évidemment en droit d'insister pour que le conflit soit résolu localement. D'après le rapport de mon conseil, si nous voulons atteindre une production suffisante pour satisfaire les percepteurs malgré les attaques, nous devons d'abord rééquiper les services de sécurité et établir une station de surveillance en orbite... ce qui devrait nous prendre un ou deux ans. Je me doute que cette réponse vous déplaît, {n}continue Vistenza avec un soupir,{/n} et je le comprends parfaitement. Mais avec les ressources dont nous disposons, il s'agit du scénario le plus probable. »

languages.text: "Çatışmayı yerel otoritelerin çözmesi konusunda ısrar etme hakkına sahipsiniz elbet. Danışmanlarımdan aldığım rapora göre belki birkaç yıl içinde... Güvenlik güçleri yeniden teçhizatlandırıldığında ve yörüngede gözetleme amaçlı bir uçsuz istasyonu kurulduğunda... Saldırılara rağmen aşar tahsildarlarını tatmin edecek bir miktar üretebiliriz." {n}Vistenza iç çekiyor.{/n} "Şüphesiz bu cevap hiç hoşunuza gitmedi. Anlıyorum ama elimizdeki kaynaklarla en olası senaryo bu."
languages.original_text: "Of course, you are entitled to insist that the conflict be resolved locally. According to my council's report, perhaps in a couple of years... when the security services have been re-equipped and a surveillance void station has been established on the orbit... we can, attacks notwithstanding, produce enough to satisfy the tithe collectors." {n}Vistenza sighs.{/n} "No doubt this answer displeases you. I do understand. But with our resources, it is the most likely scenario."

traits.locale_text: "Çatışmayı yerel otoritelerin çözmesi konusunda ısrar etme hakkına sahipsiniz elbet. Danışmanlarımdan aldığım rapora göre belki birkaç yıl içinde... Güvenlik güçleri yeniden teçhizatlandırıldığında ve yörüngede gözetleme amaçlı bir uçsuz istasyonu kurulduğunda... Saldırılara rağmen tahsildarları tatmin edecek bir miktar üretebiliriz." {n}Vistenza iç çekiyor.{/n} "Şüphesiz bu cevap hiç hoşunuza gitmeyecek. Anlıyorum ama elimizdeki kaynaklarla en olası senaryo bu."
